name: After We Fell
description: Just as Tessa makes the biggest decision of her life, everything changes. Revelations about her family, and then Hardin's, throw everything they knew before in doubt and makes their hard-won future together more difficult to claim.

review.author: stefanyrjunges
review.heading: what the hell....
review.reviewBody: This movie is atrocious. Nothing happens, there's no plot, just toxic behaviors and unnecessary drama. Hardin only gets worse and worse every movie, what an insufferable brat. I'm honestly worried about the teenagers that are watching this.
